amendment.description: Amendment to the Neumann amendment (A018) clarifies language that prohibits the use of funds for participation of U.S. Armed Forces units in any operation in the territory of the former Yugoslavia above the level of forces so deployed as of the date of enactment.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to the Neumann amendment, not preprinted in the Congressional Record, to clarify that the prohibition on United States troops does not apply to emergency air rescue operations, the airborne delivery of humanitarian supplies, or the planning and execution of OPLAN 40104 to extract UNPROFOR personnel.

action.text: Amendment (A019) offered by Mr. Murtha to the Neumann amendment (A018).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Murtha amendment (A019) Agreed to by voice vote.
